dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3672961U] Trademark and copyright claims

Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3672961U] Trademark and copyright claims

For your review.


Steve


==== Original Message ====

MIME element (text/plain) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
       (See attached file: C&D ISP elitecharme.com.pdf) 
 
 
 
 
       Theplanet.com Internet services inc. 
       1333 Stemmons Fwy, Ste 110 
       Dallas, Texas 75207 
       USA 
 
       March 29, 2007 
 
       By email (abuse@theplanet.com ) 
 
 
       Re:Trademark and copyright claims 
 
 
       To The Planet.com Internet Services Inc.: 
 
       I  am  legal counsel for the LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER and MARC JACOBS 
       companies  (hereinafter referred to as âLVMHâ) which are part of
the 
       French  group  LVMH  MoÃ«t  Hennessy Louis Vuitton. LVMH owns certain 
       copyrights  and  famous  brands protected by trademark registrations 
       throughout the world, including the United States (see next page) 
 
       We  hereby  notify  you  that  your  company  is currently providing 
       hosting  services  to  the  web site http://www.elitecharme.com/ and 
       that THIS SITE INFRINGES UPON LVMHâS TRADEMARKS AND COPYRIGHTS. 
 
       In  compliance  with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), we 
       ask  your  voluntary  assistance  in  removing  this  web  site,  or 
       requiring that its owner ceases any further infringement of the LVMH 
       intellectual property rights. 
 
       We  would  appreciate  confirmation  of  your action before April 6, 
       2007. 
 
 
       Sincerely, 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
                                               Nikolay Livadkin 
 
 
Information  for  ThePlanet.com  Internet Services Inc. (IN COMPLIANCE WITH 
THE DMCA): 
 
1.    See above for signature. 
 
2.     http://www.elitecharme.com/ is using LVMHâs copyrighted material 
without authorization and selling counterfeit merchandise, which is 
prohibited by law. LVMH is the owner of the following rights: 
 
|--------------------------+--------------------------+--------------------------| 
|                          | Trademarks               | Copyrights               | 
|--------------------------+--------------------------+--------------------------| 
| Louis Vuitton            | LVâ   (registration   No.| VA-1-225-388;

|                          | 1.519.828),        âLouis| VA-1-225-389;

|                          | Vuittonâ    (registration| VA-1-225-390;

|                          | No.  1.990.760),  âFloral| VA-1-225-391,         
VA| 
|                          | Deviceâ (registration No.| 1-250-121-and         
VA| 
|                          | 3.107.072)               | 1-250-120                | 
|--------------------------+--------------------------+--------------------------| 
| Marc Jacobs              |âMarc       Jacobsâ      (|                   
      | 
|                          |registration           No.|                          | 
|                          |1.967.123)                |                          | 
|--------------------------+--------------------------+--------------------------| 
 
 
 
3.    By clicking the links below, we feel your servers will be able to 
accurately locate the infringing material. We have included several links 
that show that counterfeits are being sold in violation of the rights 
listed in Â§ 2 above (list is not exhaustive): 
 
   http://www.elitecharme.com/ 
   http://www.elitecharme.com/index.php?p=catalog&parent=5&pg=1

4.    Our physical address is 
          LVMH Fashion Group 
          Intellectual Property Department 
          2 rue du Pont Neuf 
          75001 Paris FRANCE 
          Telephone number: 011 33 1 55 80 32 00 
          You     may    contact    our    office    through    email    at 
ipd@fr.lvmh-fashion.com 
 
 
5.    and 7.      I state UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am authorized to 
act on behalf of the owner of the above listed intellectual property rights 
(âIP Ownerâ); I have a good faith belief that the web site 
http://www.elitecharme.com/ offers items or contains materials that are not 
authorized by the IP Owner, its agent, or the law, and therefore infringes 
the IP Ownerâs rights and that the information in this notice is accurate.
